title: Meariki: The Quest for Truth
description: Meariki is a slave to the people of Ngaī Kuw̄ai and must obey the chief and look after his only daughter, Hineamuru. When Hineamuru is abducted by a warlock, Meariki and Peh̄i, a young warrior and Hineamuru's lover, go on a hazardous journey to rescue Hineamuru. Peh̄i is brave but arrogant, while Meariki is clever and resourceful, and the success of the journey rests on her. At each incident in the adventure, Peh̄i and Meariki uncover hidden truths, and Meariki comes to realise that in saving Hineamuru, she will also reveal her own true destiny.Graphic novel (fantasy) set in pre-European times.
author: Helen Pearse-Otene
